entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
